diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $MX$ is $5$ units.

Point $X$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $S$.
Point $J$ lies on the circle with center $M$ and radius $0$.
Point $S$ lies on the circle with center $M$ and radius $0$.
Point $R$ lies on the circle with center $M$ and radius $0$.
The line connecting $X$ and $R$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $M$ and $X$.
